Objects Documentation¶

class ecoviewer.objects.GraphObject.GraphObject.GraphObject(dm: DataManager, title: str = 'Graph', event_reports: list = [], event_filters: list = [], date_filtered: bool = True)¶

Bases: object

An object that contains a graph for display

Attributes:
dmDataManager

The DataManager object for the current data pull

titlestr

The title of the Graph type. This will be displayed if there is an error to tell the user what graph could not be generated

event_reportslist

A list of event identifiers that need to be reported when they affect the graph

event_filterslist

A list of event identifiers that need to be filtered out of the data collected for the graph

date_filteredbool

True if graph is filtered by the user input date range, False otherwise

Methods

check_if_file_exists

create_graph
